amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that the ballots in the plebiscite to be conducted under the bill are printed in Spanish and that ballots printed in English could only be acquired by special request.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-468 to provide that the ballots in the plebiscite to be conducted under H.R. 2499 are printed in Spanish.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 13 - 386 (Roll no. 236).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 13 - 386 (Roll no. 236).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Gutierrez.
